name: Cherrystone Clam Ceviche
keywords: appetizer, cherrystone clams, jalapeño, lime juice, raw
recipeIngredient: 2 jalapeno peppers, stemmed, seeded and minced
1/2 medium red onion, peeled and diced small
1 ripe tomato, seeded and diced small, optional
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Shuck clams into a bowl with their juice. Save 16 of the best half shells, scrape them clean and refrigerate. Remove the clams from their juice and check for shell fragments. Cut into small pieces and place in bowl. Strain half of the juice over the clams, discard the rest.
Add lime juice, jalapenos, onion, tomato, if using, and cilantro. Season with black pepper. Refrigerate overnight. Spoon the ceviche into the clam shells and serve on crushed ice.
